snippet: Michael L. Corbat has accelerated some cost cuts and clarified strategy around the edges, but the bank’s broad direction was already in place and is serving shareholders well, the authors write.
abstract: Michael L. Corbat has accelerated some cost cuts and clarified strategy around the edges, but the bank’s broad direction was already in place and is serving shareholders well, the authors write.

byline.original: By ROB COX and ANTONY CURRIE

headline.main: At Citi, Pandit Is Gone but Is Still Serving the Bank's Shareholders
